project_name.justification: The text identifies the project multiple times, including: "The Company's principal asset is the historic past-producing Idaho-Maryland Gold Mine located in Nevada County, California, USA."

company_name.justification: The press release is from "Rise Gold Corp. (CSE: RISE) (OTCQX: RYES) (the "Company")".

ceo_buyer.justification: The buyer is an unnamed "arm's length third party". Rise Gold Corp., whose CEO is Joseph Mullin, is the seller, not the buyer.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: No interest in the Idaho-Maryland Mine project was acquired. The transaction was for the sale of adjacent land, and the text states, "The Company retains ownership of the I-M Mine Property".

primary_commodity.justification: The text refers to the project as the "Idaho-Maryland Gold Mine".

verified_article_link.justification: The article, titled 'Rise Gold Announces Receipt of $702,000 with Regards to Property Sale', discusses a sale of land adjacent to the Idaho-Maryland Mine by Rise Gold Corp., which is the correct project and company.

currency.justification: The press release is from Grass Valley, California, and the company is incorporated in Nevada, USA, with the project in California. The '$' symbol is inferred to be USD.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total consideration for the sale is $4.3 million. "On November 27, 2024, Rise announced the sale of 66 acres of industrial land located adjacent to the Company's Idaho-Maryland Mine Property (the "I-M Mine Property") for $4.3 million to an arm's length third party in two transactions."

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction consideration was cash only, as stated in 'sale... for $4.3 million'. No share payments were mentioned.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: An explicit cash value was found, so this combined field is not applicable per the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were issued as payment. A repurchase option exists for the seller, but it is not part of the consideration paid by the buyer.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The announcement does not mention any exploration commitment.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The announcement does not mention any exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The announcement does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The transaction is for the sale of 66 acres of land: "Rise announced the sale of 66 acres of industrial land located adjacent to the Company's Idaho-Maryland Mine Property".

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit is specified in the quote: "...sale of 66 acres of industrial land..."

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a mineral resource statement with units of mass or volume (e.g., tonnes, ounces). A valuation of '$400 million' is mentioned but this is not a resource quantity.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is an unnamed "arm's length third party" and therefore has no identifiable ticker or exchange.
